pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: More than 21,000 78, 33, 45 rpm musical records used  on the air on WKBN, Youngstown, Ohio. Some reel-to-reel audio tapes. There are between 1500 and 2000 transcription disks of local audio produced in the studios of WKBN and also produced from international sources to time shift the audio for our local audiences. These records include speeches of Roosevelt, Hitler and Churchill among others.
pageContext._xxxcollectionExtentxtxt: More than 21,000 78, 33, 45 rpm musical records and between 1500 and 2000 transcription disks.
